title: PC randomly shutting off when trying to open up LoL client
body:
Hey all,

So recently I've been having this strange issue where when i try to open up the LoL client, my PC will just randomly go to a black screen, and then just shut off or restart. Even does it in the middle of games.

I've tried uninstalling LoL, hasn't fixed the issue. I've googled the issue on here and haven't really seen anything related to this topic as of recent.

Has caused me to leave two games in the past two days.

Just wondering if i can get some help with this issue

, thanks.

replies.body: Sometimes random and sudden PC shutoffs can be traced back to [**overheating**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq7), which is definitely not good. Let's first check for anything that might be causing your pc to run a little too hot like dust clogging vents or fans not working.
